Feb. 24, 2018 D Valley Entertainment Contest (Second Grade Brass)
Valley Entertainment Contest (Second Grade Brass) 20 Entertainments Contest Valley Entertainment Contest valley-entertainment-contest-2nd-grade-brass
Valley Hotel, Fivemiletown, County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, UK Adjudicators: Alan Morrison for music, Frank Sweeney for entertainment In the event of a tie, music mark takes precedence
Most entertaining band: Roughan Silver Band Best march: Roughan Silver Band Best soloist: Andrew Gordon (cornet, Roughan Silver Band)
March 2, 2018, 12:52 p.m. March 2, 2018, 12:56 p.m.
1 Roughan Silver Band Stephen Crooks
2 Carrick with Ashgrove Ernest Ruddock
3 Ballyduff Silver Band William Hill
